explanation: [0-0] An old man in a red shirt and black hat is wearing black gloves and holding a revolver. Behind him is a field of dry grass, and the sky is filled with white clouds.

[0-2] Then, the old man in the red shirt cocks the revolver with his left hand and fires a shot. White smoke comes out of the barrel. He then cocks the revolver again with his left hand and fires two shots. White smoke comes out of the barrel again.
